instance.context:
Driving along the caliche-topped road to town , Howard talked . Finally he said , `` Tell me about yourself '' , and Linda_Kay told him , because she thought herself that she had had an interesting life . She was such a well-rounded teenager , having been a twirler , Future_Farmers sweetheart , and secretary of Future_Homemakers . In her sophomore year she had started going_steady with Bobby_Joe , who was a
football_player , Future_Homemakers sweetheart , and president of Future_Farmers . It was easy to see that they were made_for each other , and they knew what they wanted . Bobby_Joe would be a senior this year , and he planned to graduate . But there was no need for Linda_Kay to go_on , since all she wanted in life was to make a home for Bobby_Joe and ( blushing ) raise his children .
